name: seal-case
effect: Contains Seals used for decorating Pokéballs.
short_effect: Stores Seals that can be applied to Poké Ball capsules.

flavor_text.black_white: A case for storing Seals that can be applied to the Capsule cases of Poké Balls.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: A case for storing Seals that can be applied to the Capsule cases of Poké Balls.
